concise_definition: n. 人名：特雷弗（男性名）

definitions.explanation_en: A masculine given name of English origin, derived from the Welsh name 'Trefor', meaning 'from the large settlement' or 'from the homestead'. It is commonly used in English-speaking countries and has no inherent meaning beyond its use as a personal identifier.
definitions.explanation_cn: 一个源自英语的男性名字，来源于威尔士语名字 'Trefor'，意为“来自大聚居地”或“来自家园”。该名字在英语国家中广泛使用，其本身并无超出作为人名之外的固有含义。
definitions.example_en: Trevor is the project manager at our new office in Manchester.
definitions.example_cn: 特雷弗是我们位于曼彻斯特新办公室的项目经理。
